author: Staff Reporter
text:
More than 2,200 persons participated in the mini marathon organised by Y’S Men’s Club of Coimbatore and Coimbatore Institute of Technology here on Sunday. Eminent television personality and Chief Executive Officer of Talkshop Academy C. Gopinath flagged off the rally from the institution premises. President of the club R. Selvakumar said that more than 500 participants got newly enrolled in their blood donors’ directory.

Among men, A. Mano of STC Pollachi and M. Dharmaraj and Paul Mathew of S. Star Coimbatore secured the first three prizes.

Among women, Padmavathi, V. Soniya and J. Sangeetha of Sathrapathi Sivaji Sports Club bagged the first three places. President of Y’s Men’s Club (India) P. Vijayakumar and CIT Principal V. Selladurai gave away prizes.
title: Mini marathon organised
